title: Казки У
overview: Do you miss fairy tales? A little bit of nostalgia wouldn't hurt? Or do you want to occupy your child with useful activities? You can do this together with the TET TV channel in the project "Казки У". Important heroes of the project were the fabulous Koschei the Immortal, Ivan the Fool, Snow White and other charismatic characters.The project will win your heart with incredible costumes, great locations and unusual plot twists. Its creators will not just make a beautiful picture for the viewer, but also convey the story in a light humorous form. After all, the project was created by Studio Kvartal 95. Do you want to plunge into a fairy tale and cheer yourself up? - Then turn on the TV channel TET and relax from all worries.
